option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
server.port=8082 spring.application.name=conference-service
# Database Configuration spring.datasource.url=jdbc:h2:mem:conference-db spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.h2.Driver spring.datasource.username=sa spring.datasource.password=
# JPA Configuration spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.H2Dialect spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.jpa.show-sql=true
# H2 Console spring.h2.console.enabled=true spring.h2.console.path=/h2-console
# Actuator management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=*
# Eureka Client (disabled for now) spring.cloud.discovery.enabled=false eureka.client.enabled=false
# Config Server (disabled for now) spring.cloud.config.enabled=false
# OpenFeign - Keynote Service keynote-service.url=http://localhost:8081
# Resilience4J Configuration resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.registerHealthIndicator=true resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.slidingWindowSize=10 resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.minimumNumberOfCalls=5 resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.permittedNumberOfCallsInHalfOpenState=3 resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.waitDurationInOpenState=5s resilience4j.circuitbreaker.instances.keynoteService.failureRateThreshold=50
# OpenAPI springdoc.api-docs.path=/api-docs springdoc.swagger-ui.path=/swagger-ui.html

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:

# Database Configuration spring.datasource.url=jdbc:h2:mem:conference-db spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.h2.Driver spring.datasource.username=sa spring.datasource.password=
